title: EP 132: SURRENDERING TO WHAT IS AND SOME PARENTHOOD TRUTHS
description: This episode I talk about surrendering to what is - taking a dump with a toddler on your lap and buying an Otter Box. I also talk about the taboos of motherhood - miscarriages, pregnancy sex and telling the in-laws to shut it! A young man writes in about how to stop wanting his father's approval. Let's get super deeeeeeeep on it, bros.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
